All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Component, Composite, Composite.CompositeComponent, Composite.CompositeService, Composite.CompositeWidget, ApplicationComponent, ApplicationService, ApplicationWidget, Service, Control<Timestamp>, FormElementAware<Timestamp,Object>, Viewable, Viewable.ViewableComponent, Viewable.ViewableService, Viewable.ViewableWidget, Widget
public class DateTimeControl
extends BaseControl<Timestamp>

This class represents a control that has both date and time.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getRawValueType

public DataType getRawValueType()
Description copied from interface: Control
This method should be overridden by the control, returning the type of the value of this control. It is later used in ConverterFactory to determine the BaseConverter used to transfer the values from Datato control and back.

Returns:
The type of the value of this control as specified in the given DataType object.

isRead

public boolean isRead()
Description copied from class: BaseControl
By default the control is considered read if it has a not null data read from request.

Specified by:

Overrides:
isRead in class BaseControl<Timestamp>
Returns:
whether the control data was present in the HTTP request.

getViewModel

public DateTimeControl.ViewModel getViewModel()
Description copied from class: BaseApplicationWidget
Returns the view model of this control. The view model is used to retrieve data that MVC view layer can access. Note that returned view model and its type is entirely the sole responsibility of the control. However, the controls may change the return type to their implementation of view model.

Overrides:
getViewModel in class BaseControl<Timestamp>

setRawValue

public void setRawValue(Timestamp value)
Description copied from class: BaseControl
Sets the raw control value (as it was read from request/written to response). It is usually set by Converter when value of FormElement that owns this BaseControl changes.

Specified by:
setRawValue in interface Control<Timestamp>
Overrides:
